successes.title: Three New Treasure Chests of Realistic Resource Tokens
successes.description: Upgrade your board games with custom-made tokens from your choice of the Food Crate, Resource Vault, and/or the Energy Box.

Pledges.description: TOAST - You and your favorite game that uses the new resource tokens will be toasted on camera by the publishers. Add the toast to other reward levels for $1.
ONE TREASURE - 1 chest of your choice from among the Food Crate, Resource Vault, and Energy Box (each includes stretch goals). Post-KS direct-order price will average $45.

TWO TREASURES - 2 chests of your choice from among the Food Crate, Resource Vault, and Energy Box (2 different chests or 2 of the same chest; each includes stretch goals). Post-KS direct-order price will average $90 total.

THREE TREASURES - 3 chests of your choice from among the Food Crate, Resource Vault, and Energy Box (3 different chests, 3 of the same chest, or any combination of 3 chests; each includes stretch goals). Extra chests are $29 each (max 6 copies per pledge). Post-KS direct-order price will average $135 total.
